data.name: Text Twisted Pro
data.detailed_description:
Let's twist!

Get ready for some word-finding fun game in Text Twisted Pro!

Look at the jumbled letters and find all the word combinations. Over 40000 levels.

Find many words as you can.

Use the Twist button to rearrange the letters and find more combinations.

Test your vocabulary skills and try to score as many points as possible in this game.

How many rounds can you beat?

Featuring:

- Over 40000 levels.
- 2 Different Game Modes: Timed (2 minutes to guess all words) or Untimed (Unlimited time).
- 2D Cartoon style game.
- Improve your vocabulary with this game.
- Learn new words at every level.

Enjoy!!!

data.short_description: Let's twist! Get ready for some word-finding fun game in Text Twisted Pro! Over 40000 levels!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 (x86)
  • Processor: I3 2 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 4500 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1 or 10 - 64bit recommended
  • Processor: I5 2.4 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 930 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
